name: Norman Maggot Style LoRA
description:
This is a micro-LoRA to recreate the style of Norman Maggot.

I suggest using this LoRA at 0.9-1.0 for best results.

This LoRA was trained on 1,500 pictures sfw and nsfw with NAI. All examples images were generated on AbyssOrangeMix3_A1 and OrangeMix VAE.

Norman Maggot has a lot of line art and monochrome pictures, even with (monochrome:1.1) in the negatives, sometimes it will generate monochrome. In the preview examples, I decided to put mainly monochrome pictures.

All pictures were upscaled using these settings:

  • ESRGAN4x

  • Hires. Steps: 5

  • Denoising Strength: 0.05

  • Upscale by 1.5 (768x768)

Embeds and LoRAs used in prompts: Bad Prompt

Be sure to leave a review, comment and check out my other LoRAs - You might see something you like here.

Everything I'm making will always be free but if you want to show a little bit more support, you can buy me a coffee - https://ko-fi.com/ekune
